definitions.definition: An illuminating realization or discovery , often resulting in a personal feeling of elation , awe , or wonder .
examples: It came to her in an epiphany what her life's work was to be.

definitions.definition: A manifestation or appearance of a divine or superhuman being .

main_definition: An illuminating realization or discovery , often resulting in a personal feeling of elation , awe , or wonder .
secondary_definitions: A manifestation or appearance of a divine or superhuman being .
( Christianity ) Alternative letter-case form of Epiphany .
